name: Fried Cabbage and Egg Noodles
author: judi
summary: This is a German recipe from my Grandmother. It's cabbage that is lightly browned in butter and mixed with egg noodles and browned lightly for a wonderful, hearty, and fast dish.
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook the egg noodles in the boiling water until the pasta is tender yet firm to the bite, about 5 minutes
While the noodles cook, melt the butter in a large skillet over low heat
Add the cabbage to the melted butter; season with salt and pepper
Cover and cook until the cabbage begins to brown, 5 to 7 minutes
Stir the drained noodles into the cabbage; cook and stir until the noodles begin to brown, about 5 minutes
